title: US Stocks Advance as Traders Look Beyond New Washington Risks
description: US stocks rose as traders weighed a combination of fresh trade and policy risks against a strong start to fourth-quarter earnings.
content: US stocks rose as traders weighed a combination of fresh trade and policy risks against a strong start to fourth-quarter earnings.
